S_thermostat module¶

S_thermostat.py

Berendsen only.

S_thermostat.Berendsen(ptcls, params, it)[source]¶

Update particle velocity based on Berendsen thermostat.

Parameters

  • ptlcs (class) – Particles’s data. See S_particles.py for the detailed information

  • params (class) – Simulation parameters. See S_params for detail information

  • it (int) – timestep

References

[1] Berendsen et al. J Chem Phys 81 3684 (1984)

S_thermostat.calc_kin_temp(ptcls, params)[source]¶

Calculate the kinetic energy and temperature

Parameters

  • ptlcs (class) – Particles’s data. See S_particles.py for the detailed information

  • params (class) – Simulation’s parameters. See S_params for detail information

Returns

  • K (array_like) – Kinetic energy of each species

  • T (array_like) – Temperature of each species

Note
